message.content:
1. Δ-9-tetrahydrocannabinol (THC) is the primary psychoactive constituent of cannabis.
2. Acute administration of THC impairs human facial affect recognition.
3. The endocannabinoid system is implicated in emotional processing.

messages.content:
Statement: Acute administration of the primary psychoactive constituent of cannabis, Δ-9-tetrahydrocannabinol (THC), impairs human facial affect recognition, implicating the endocannabinoid system in emotional processing.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
